title: Microsoft Windows Update Agent Directory Junction Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Microsoft Windows. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within Windows Update Agent. By creating a directory junction, an attacker can abuse Windows Update Agent to delete a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Microsoft has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2021-38634
timeline:
2021-06-08 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-09-16 - Coordinated public release of advisory
